title: No End Save Victory: Perspectives on World War II
description: A collection of essays by leading historians--including Stephen E. Ambrose, Caleb Carr, John Keegan, and William Manchester--reflects on diverse events and key personalities of World War II, including the Battle of Britain, the Blitzkrieg campaign across Poland, Churchill, the siege of Berlin, and much more. 35,000 first printing.
author: Robert Cowley
